    • Method Detail

      • close

        public static <E extends Exception> void close(Iterable<? extends GenericCloseable<? extends E>> closeables)
                                        throws E extends Exception
        Close multiple resources, ensuring that all resources get closed even if one of them throws a Throwable.

        The first caught throwable will be re-thrown, and any additional throwable will be suppressed.

        Parameters:
        closeables - The resources to close
        Throws:
        E - if a closeable throws such an exception
        E extends Exception

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(Closeable resource)
        Close a resource without throwing an exception.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to close

      • closeQuietly

        @SafeVarargs
public static void closeQuietly(Iterable<? extends Closeable>... resourceIterables)
        Close resources without throwing an exception.
        Parameters:
        resourceIterables - the iterables containing the resources to close
